intro: Iphigenia somaliensis, commonly known as the Somali iphigenia, is a flowering plant native to the dry, arid regions of Somalia and neighboring areas. Iphigenia somaliensis is often found growing on rocky slopes and in sandy soils, showcasing its resilience to extreme conditions.
